value.title: Administer containers in Azure
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll create and manage your Azure Container Instances, and see how they can be used to provide elastic scale for Kubernetes.

topItems.title: Introduction to Docker containers
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

topItems.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Explore Azure networking services
value.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

value.title: Manage software delivery by using a release based workflow on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to implement a release based workflow on GitHub using project boards, branches, and releases.

value.title: Better Azure content, programs & services through applied data science | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Lisa Cohen joins Scott Hanselman to explain how Microsoft uses data science to help Azure customers.  Learn about content, programs, and services to guide you on your cloud journey while getting a glimpse behind the scenes into how data drives product investments.  0:00 – Opening 0:25 – Introduction
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qll-wtjIobU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Architect infrastructure operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor, analyze, and manage the ongoing operation of your infrastructure in Azure.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Architect modern applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to build modern applications using PaaS services for applications, caching, containers and Kubernetes in Azure.

topItems.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

topItems.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Explore Azure Storage services
value.excerpt: Learn about the different storage options that are available in Azure Storage.

value.title: Use basketball stats to optimize game play with Visual Studio Code, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY
value.excerpt: This *Space Jam: A New Legacy* - inspired learning path aims to equip you with data science, web development skills, and coding strategies to impact a game of basketball in real time, ensuring victory for the Tune Squad in their next game.

topItems.title: Create a web app that uses data to make decisions on the basketball court
topItems.excerpt: Create a web app by using JavaScript, Azure, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code to help the Tune Squad coach use data to make decisions on the basketball court, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY.

topItems.title: Build an AI web app by using Python and Flask
topItems.excerpt: Use Python, Flask, and Azure Cognitive Services to build a web app that incorporates AI

value.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

value.title: Build an AI web app by using Python and Flask
value.excerpt: Use Python, Flask, and Azure Cognitive Services to build a web app that incorporates AI

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 6: Describe Azure cost management and service level agreements
value.excerpt: Learn about the factors that influence cost, tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend, and how Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) can impact your application design decisions.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

topItems.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
topItems.excerpt: Learn about service-level agreements (SLAs) in Azure, and how they can affect your application design decisions. See how to access preview services and learn how they affect your planning.

value.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
value.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

value.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Create a basic GitHub Action and use that action in a workflow.

value.title: Azure Portal “How To” Series
value.excerpt: Welcome to our weekly series that highlights specific aspects of the Azure portal so you can be more efficient and productive while deploying your cloud workloads from the portal.

topItems.title: How to capture a VM image and use it from the image gallery
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to create an image from your virtual machine. We’ll show how you can then use that image to create more virtual machines and replicate the image across Microsoft Azure regions.    - Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ukqbeiejLYE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Quick command tips for copying, pasting, and more
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to quickly and easily copy the current view's title, print the current view, or go full screen increasing focus on the current view.   - Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  - Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bSjGzCtFXZA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: How to build a graph and use links in Azure Workbooks
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to create a hive cluster in Microsoft Azure workbooks for high-density views and how to use links in workbooks to show other workbooks or to reference Azure portal blades.    - Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ODHczGpGmEQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: How to get started with Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes
topItems.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to get started with Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes.  Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal   Make sure to keep an eye on our Azure Portal "How to" Series
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/d4F83oblkWk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create and host web sites by using GitHub Pages
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your personal, organization, and project sites for free with GitHub Pages.

value.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.

value.title: Choose the best Azure IoT service for your application
value.excerpt: Examine Azure IoT services, and choose the right service for your scenario.

value.title: Choose the best monitoring service for visibility, insight, and mitigation of service outages
value.excerpt: Discover solutions that help IT organizations with insights into the health and performance of their applications running in the cloud.

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the basics of Docker containers, container orchestration with Kubernetes, and managed clusters on Azure Kubernetes Service.

topItems.title: Introduction to Docker containers
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

topItems.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
topItems.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

topItems.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
value.excerpt: Learn about service-level agreements (SLAs) in Azure, and how they can affect your application design decisions. See how to access preview services and learn how they affect your planning.

value.title: Choose the best AI service for your needs
value.excerpt: Examine Azure's AI services, and choose the right one for your company.

value.title: Build continuous integration (CI) workflows by using GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Learn how to create workflows that enable you to use Continuous Integration (CI) for your projects.

value.title: Automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to automate DevOps processes by using GitHub Apps that handle repetitive tasks, enforce team policies, and maintain a tidy repository.

value.title: Settle competing commits by using merge conflict resolution on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to settle overlapping commits across branches by using merge conflict resolution.

value.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.excerpt: Create two deployment workflows using GitHub Actions and Microsoft Azure.

value.excerpt: Create a web app by using JavaScript, Azure, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code to help the Tune Squad coach use data to make decisions on the basketball court, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY.

value.title: Communicate effectively on GitHub by using Markdown
value.excerpt: Learn to use Markdown to communicate with brevity, clarity, and expression.
